snippet: The Brooklyn Museum has reclaimed a 4-foot-7-inch vase dating from Trenton’s heyday that it lent to the New Jersey city in 1997.
abstract: Brooklyn Museum reclaims a 4-foot-7-inch porcelain vase that was on loan at the Trenton City Museum, expressing concerns over the museum's financial problems; vase, dating from the New Jersey city's heyday as an industrial center, was a source of local pride for the struggling community.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn Museum has reclaimed a 4-foot-7-inch vase dating from Trenton’s heyday that it lent to the New Jersey city in 1997.

headline.seo: Trenton, Already Beleaguered, Loses a Vase It Holds Dear
headline.main: With Jobs Already Lost in Trenton, Now They’ve Taken the Porcelain
headline.print_headline: Jobs Lost, Now They’ve Taken the Porcelain
